product_name: Phorm S 510 Flex Gel Bike Saddle - Women's - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Equally suited to park paths or the streets that lead to your favorite brew pub down on the corner, this women's saddle from the Phorm City Series is for riders who love a soft, comfortable ride.
